description:
Structured response from the outcomes agent.

How/Why:
  - We need a stable, machine-validated response that can be returned directly from an API endpoint.
  - The response intentionally supports a deny-path when a topic is disallowed.

blocked_category.description: High-level category used when blocking a topic.
blocked_category.title: Blocked Category

error.description: Simple error code when the topic is blocked.
error.title: Error

ok.description: True when the topic is allowed and outcomes were generated.
ok.title: Ok

outcomes.description: A small list of straightforward learning outcomes.
outcomes.title: Outcomes

title: OutcomesAgentResponse
